text: tonight Beijing is reimposing

there is a reminder of how difficult the

Wuhan probably at the beginning of
December last year in total there were

infections and our China correspondent
John Sadler has just returned from a

as it endured one of the world's

distant memory interrupted lives have
resumed again but beneath the appearance
of normality the authorities are on edge
people we arranged to meet are followed
by plain clothes police who block our

leave and at this apartment block a

on us during the lockdown anger erupted
here over how it was managed with a

the crisis shook the foundations of a

filming
in January Wu Hans Health Service was

there is now only one narrative that

in eventually bringing the virus under
control
China is determined that this place will
not be remembered for a cover-up that

the cornerstone of a great national

there's only patriotism and praise
